articles.title: Sensational two-way baseball star Shohei Ohtani named the unanimous choice for MVP of the American League - CNN
articles.description: Baseball's sensational two-way star Shohei Ohtani was unanimously voted the 2021 American League Most Valuable Player on Thursday.
